data.title: Estates Auction: March 25-26, 2023
data.meta_description: New Orleans Auction Galleries is pleased to present antiques, fine art, silver, jewelry, carpets and more in our March 25-26 Estates Auction. The t...
data.text: New Orleans Auction Galleries is pleased to present antiques, fine art, silver, jewelry, carpets and more in our March 25-26 Estates Auction. The two-day sale features French paintings, furniture, decorative arts from the Estate of Norma Crawford Myers of Dallas and the Estate of Mahin Forrest of Houston. We are honored to offer works by some of Louisiana’s most celebrated artists, in addition to antiques and decorative objects, from The Estate of Dr. Joseph Elmo “Sonny” Dugas, Jr. and Mrs. Betty Jean Ford Dugas of New Orleans. The sale also features historic and contemporary Southern art from the collection of Jean Bragg Gallery. Highlights include an impressive Steinway & Sons Model D Concert Grand Piano, a collection of fine silk carpets, a stunning Van Cleef & Arpels diamond and emerald bracelet, a fine Louis-Philippe cased silver gilt dessert set by Francois Laslier and works by Gustave Loiseau, Paul Francois Quinsac, William Henry Buck, Ida Kohlmeyer, Walter Anderson and others.
